data.name: The money in the bank
data.description:
Create a function 

```
effectiveAnnualRate(initialValue, finalValue, initialDate, finalDate) 
```

that returns an array with the 

- annual effective interest rate
- gain value after a year from the initial date
- the value after one year from the initial date

Note :

- initialDate and final Date are ```Date``` objects

- the three values should be displayed with up to two decimal places as numbers.

- for purposes of the formula, for the bank 1 year equals 360 days; so for the test, there will not be a higher rank than 360 days.

- the interest rate is returned as a percentage

Ref :

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Compound_interest
